title: 2024 US Election Results Live Updates
US election highlights: Harris cancels speech as Trump inches closer to victory
content: Former President Donald Trump and vice president Kamala Harris faced off in a pivotal election that drew millions of voters. Trump secured early victories in Indiana and Kentucky, while Harris claimed Vermont. With polls closing in key states like Georgia, the nation awaits the outcome of this closely watched race.
summary: Former President Donald Trump and vice president Kamala Harris faced off in a pivotal election that drew millions of voters. Trump secured early victories in Indiana and Kentucky, while Harris claimed Vermont. With polls closing in key states like Georgia, the nation awaits the outcome of this closely watched race.

title: 'I'm gonna f**k you up': Cardi B's meltdown on Insta live as Trump claims victory
content: Cardi B hurled abuses and broke down during an Instagram live when a fan asked her to be present at the Trump inauguration. “I swear to god I’m gonna f**k you up, get away from me,” she said during the video with more than 37,000 followers. “I’m sick of you! Burn you’re f**king hats motherf**ker. I’m really sad. I swear to god I’m really sad," she said.
summary: Cardi B hurled abuses and broke down during an Instagram live when a fan asked her to be present at the Trump inauguration. “I swear to god I’m gonna f**k you up, get away from me,” she said during the video with more than 37,000 followers. “I’m sick of you! Burn you’re f**king hats motherf**ker. I’m really sad. I swear to god I’m really sad," she said.

title: Moo Deng's Trump's victory prediction in US election proves to be bang on
content: Moo Deng, a beloved pygmy hippo in Thailand, has become the latest animal oracle to weigh in on the 2024 US election. In a video that went viral, Moo Deng chose a watermelon carved with Donald Trump's name, sparking celebrations among Trump supporters and drawing comparisons to other animal predictions.
summary: Moo Deng, a beloved pygmy hippo in Thailand, has become the latest animal oracle to weigh in on the 2024 US election. In a video that went viral, Moo Deng chose a watermelon carved with Donald Trump's name, sparking celebrations among Trump supporters and drawing comparisons to other animal predictions.

title: When Donald Trump explained how his youngest son Barron grew 6 feet 9 inches tall
content: All the Trumps are tall including Melania but Barron's height is shocking and he clearly dominates the room he's in because of his height. His father did not miss a chance to speak about his height every time he appeared on a podcast as he also mentioned how smart Barron is and how he knows a lot about the internet, cryptocurrency etc.
summary: All the Trumps are tall including Melania but Barron's height is shocking and he clearly dominates the room he's in because of his height. His father did not miss a chance to speak about his height every time he appeared on a podcast as he also mentioned how smart Barron is and how he knows a lot about the internet, cryptocurrency etc.

title: Trump praises vice president-elect JD Vance and his 'beautiful wife' Usha Vance in victory speech
content: Donald Trump claimed victory in the 2024 US presidential election, with projections showing him defeating Democratic opponent Kamala Harris. Addressing supporters in Florida, he celebrated the win alongside his running mate, JD Vance, and Vance's wife, Usha Chilukuri Vance, who is set to become the first non-white US second lady.
summary: Donald Trump claimed victory in the 2024 US presidential election, with projections showing him defeating Democratic opponent Kamala Harris.  Addressing supporters in Florida, he celebrated the win alongside his running mate, JD Vance, and Vance's wife, Usha Chilukuri Vance, who is set to become the first non-white US second lady.

title: What happens to Donald Trump's criminal cases after he becomes President? Can he pardon himself?
content: Former US President Donald Trump is facing multiple criminal charges, including federal and state cases. A potential second term could impact these cases, potentially halting or dismissing some due to legal complexities and potential presidential immunity. The possibility of a self-pardon, while legally ambiguous, adds another layer of complexity to the situation.
summary: Former US President Donald Trump is facing multiple criminal charges, including federal and state cases. A potential second term could impact these cases, potentially halting or dismissing some due to legal complexities and potential presidential immunity.  The possibility of a self-pardon, while legally ambiguous, adds another layer of complexity to the situation.

title: 'Powerful recommitment to great alliance': Netanyahu as Israel celebrates Trump's election win
content: Israel's right-wing government welcomed Donald Trump's US election win. The government sees it as positive for Israeli-American relations. Trump has pledged strong support for Israel, particularly in the current Middle East conflict. Israeli settler leaders also expressed hope for a more favorable stance from the US under a Trump administration.
summary: Israel's right-wing government welcomed Donald Trump's US election win. The government sees it as positive for Israeli-American relations. Trump has pledged strong support for Israel, particularly in the current Middle East conflict. Israeli settler leaders also expressed hope for a more favorable stance from the US under a Trump administration.

title: Italy PM says Trump victory will strengthen country's bond with US
NATO's Rutte congratulates Trump on US election
US election results: Harris vs Trump – Who holds the edge in swing states?
content: Donald Trump is on the verge of winning the 2024 US presidential election, securing victories in key battleground states like Georgia and North Carolina. While Pennsylvania remains a crucial tipping point, Trump's lead in Michigan, Wisconsin, and Nevada suggests a potential return to the White House.
summary: Donald Trump is on the verge of winning the 2024 US presidential election, securing victories in key battleground states like Georgia and North Carolina. While Pennsylvania remains a crucial tipping point, Trump's lead in Michigan, Wisconsin, and Nevada suggests a potential return to the White House.

title: Pennsylvania election results: Trump wins key swing state Pennsylvania
content: Former US President Donald Trump's victory in North Carolina intensifies the battle for the White House, with Pennsylvania emerging as the crucial swing state. Holding a significant 19 electoral votes, Pennsylvania's outcome could determine whether Trump makes a successful comeback or Kamala Harris becomes the first female president.
summary: Former US President Donald Trump's victory in North Carolina intensifies the battle for the White House, with Pennsylvania emerging as the crucial swing state. Holding a significant 19 electoral votes, Pennsylvania's outcome could determine whether Trump makes a successful comeback or Kamala Harris becomes the first female president.

title: California election results: Kamala Harris maintains control over stronghold, clinches 54 electoral votes in state
content: Kamala Harris has won California, securing its 54 electoral votes and a major victory in the 2024 presidential election. Harris's win continues a trend of Democratic dominance in the state, where no Republican presidential candidate has won since 1988.
summary: Kamala Harris has won California, securing its 54 electoral votes and a major victory in the 2024 presidential election.  Harris's win continues a trend of Democratic dominance in the state, where no Republican presidential candidate has won since 1988.

title: Economy, Democracy, Abortion: Key issues for American voters as contest between Trump, Harris remain razor-thin
content: Early exit polls reveal that the state of democracy is the top concern for most voters in the US presidential election. Abortion and the economy are also key issues. The race between Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump remains tight, with voter sentiment reflecting a mix of pessimism and optimism about the country's direction.
summary: Early exit polls reveal that the state of democracy is the top concern for most voters in the US presidential election. Abortion and the economy are also key issues. The race between Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump remains tight, with voter sentiment reflecting a mix of pessimism and optimism about the country's direction.

title: As Americans vote, it's guns out in America
content: With a deeply divided America bracing for the presidential election results, concerns are rising about the potential for political violence. The US already witnessed a surge in such incidents this year, fueled by misinformation and access to firearms. Experts warn of armed groups and online platforms promoting violence, raising alarms about the state of American democracy.
summary: With a deeply divided America bracing for the presidential election results, concerns are rising about the potential for political violence. The US already witnessed a surge in such incidents this year, fueled by misinformation and access to firearms.  Experts warn of armed groups and online platforms promoting violence, raising alarms about the state of American democracy.

title: Philadelphia police say they don't know what 'massive cheating' Trump is talking about
content: ​The Philadelphia Police Department told CNN that they were not aware of what Donald Trump referred to in his post as massive cheating and they did not know of any issue regarding the voting that required a law enforcement response. ​"There is absolutely no truth to this allegation. It is yet another example of disinformation. Voting in Philadelphia has been safe and secure," Philadelphia City Commissioner Seth Bluestein posted on X.
summary: ​The Philadelphia Police Department told CNN that they were not aware of what Donald Trump referred to in his post as massive cheating and they did not know of any issue regarding the voting that required a law enforcement response. ​"There is absolutely no truth to this allegation. It is yet another example of disinformation. Voting in Philadelphia has been safe and secure," Philadelphia City Commissioner Seth Bluestein posted on X.

title: Google clarifies why it's showing 'where to vote for Harris' after Elon Musk flags issue
content: "The 'where to vote' panel is triggering for some specific searches [because] Harris is also the name of a county in [Texas]," Google said in a statement. "Fix is coming," the search giant said, adding: "Note very few people actually search for voting places this way." Elon Musk responded to the clarification.
summary: "The 'where to vote' panel is triggering for some specific searches [because] Harris is also the name of a county in [Texas]," Google said in a statement. "Fix is coming," the search giant said, adding: "Note very few people actually search for voting places this way." Elon Musk responded to the clarification.

title: Kamala Harris wins Guam straw poll with 49%. This territory is always right in...
content: Guam is a US island territory in Micronesia in the Western Pacific and not a state and hence it is not eligible to elect members of the Electoral College. Its straw poll results, which have been held every four years since 1980, are non-binding and don't count towards the Electoral College.
summary: Guam is a US island territory in Micronesia in the Western Pacific and not a state and hence it is not eligible to elect members of the Electoral College. Its straw poll results, which have been held every four years since 1980, are non-binding and don't count towards the Electoral College.

title: Donald Trump to spend election 2024 night with Elon Musk; Kamala Harris to be at Howard University
content: Former President Donald Trump will spend election night at Mar-a-Lago with a select group of donors, including Elon Musk. The evening will feature multiple gatherings, culminating in an address at the Palm Beach Convention Center. Meanwhile, Vice President Kamala Harris will attend a watch party at her alma mater, Howard University, after a family dinner.
summary: Former President Donald Trump will spend election night at Mar-a-Lago with a select group of donors, including Elon Musk. The evening will feature multiple gatherings, culminating in an address at the Palm Beach Convention Center. Meanwhile, Vice President Kamala Harris will attend a watch party at her alma mater, Howard University, after a family dinner.

title: Trump says Oprah should be ashamed: 'It's ridiculous...she's a divider'
content: “I think Oprah’s become a major divider in our country and I think frankly she should be ashamed of herself,” he continued. “And you know who else should be ashamed? Fox. Because I’ve seen Oprah on Fox about 50 times making the same statement. And I think it’s a disgrace what Fox does ’cause everyone thinks Fox is so pro-Trump. They’re not pro-Trump at all. They’ve put Oprah on all morning long," Trump said after his vote.
summary: “I think Oprah’s become a major divider in our country and I think frankly she should be ashamed of herself,” he continued. “And you know who else should be ashamed? Fox. Because I’ve seen Oprah on Fox about 50 times making the same statement. And I think it’s a disgrace what Fox does ’cause everyone thinks Fox is so pro-Trump. They’re not pro-Trump at all.
